GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS INFANTRY SCORE TRANSFORMER PATH_THROUGH_INFANTRY PRELOAD

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ShieldParachuteLaunch" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldtoParachuting") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ShieldBored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldIdleToSelected") end if Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldfromParachuting") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ShieldSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldfromSuppressed") elseif Prev == "STATE_ShieldParachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldfromParachuting") elseif Prev == "STATE_ShieldSelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldSelectedToIdle") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Saluting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_FromSaluting") elseif Prev == "STATE_Suppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromSuppressed") elseif Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") elseif Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") elseif Prev == "STATE_stunned_flailing" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("STATE_stunned_landing") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_Saluting" and Prev ~= "TRANS_ToSaluting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ToSaluting") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ParachuteLaunch" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toParachuting") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_Suppressed" and Prev ~= "TRANS_toSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toSuppressed") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_OverWater" and Prev ~= "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ToWater") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_OverWater" or Prev == "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_FromWater") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end if Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") end

DieMuxData.DeathTypesForbidden: MAULED BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
MAULED ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
MAULED BITTEN LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
MAULED BITTEN ELECTROCUTED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
MAULED BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED STABBED IRRADIATED
MAULED BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED IRRADIATED
MAULED BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED
